properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Men of faith rise up and sing Of the great and glorious King You are strong when you feel weak In your brokenness complete{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shout to the north and the South Sing to the east and the West Jesus is Savior to all Lord of heaven and earth{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rise up women of the truth Stand and sing to broken hearts Who can know the healing power Of our awesome King of love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shout to the north and the South Sing to the east and the West Jesus is Savior to all Lord of heaven and earth{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We’ve been through fire We’ve been through rain We’ve been refined by the Power of Your name We’ve fallen deeper in love with You You’ve burned the truth on our lips{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shout to the north and the South Sing to the east and the West Jesus is Savior to all Lord of heaven and earth{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rise up Church with broken wings Fill this place with songs again Of our God who reigns on high By His grace again we’ll fly{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shout to the north and the South Sing to the east and the West Jesus is Savior to all Lord of heaven and earth{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord of Heaven and earth Lord of Heaven and earth Lord of Heaven and earth 10. Shout to the north and the South Sing to the east and the West Jesus is Savior to all Lord of heaven and earth{/lang-eng}
